name: Omen (D)
customPrimary: Continuously fires an EMP arc that deals %s energy damage and %s EMP damage every %s seconds at a random target within %s su. Not modified by hullmods.

customAncillary: The weapon turns automatically. Affected by turn rate bonuses.
